JobFullDesc: Are you an experienced, passionate pioneer in communication, transformation and technology? A solutions builder who wants to work in a collaborative environment with a strong company culture, without the extensive demands of travel. If so, consider an opportunity with our innovative and forward-thinking US Delivery Center (USDC). At Deloitte's US Delivery Center (USDC) we help clients achieve a higher level of service in operational efficiency and business value. The USDC leverages scale, talent, and a center delivery model to provide high quality, cost-effective service with standardized processes and procedures. Our US Delivery Centers have been growing since 2014 with significant, continued growth on the horizon. Our delivery centers are based in Mechanicsburg, PA, Lake Mary, FL and Gilbert, AZ.Work you'll doFinance and Data Technicians will support Deloitte's Actuarial & Insurance Solutions (A&IS) Core team by helping clients optimize their current processes and operating model. Finance and Data Technician's job functions include the following, but not limited to:• Executing and improving processes to support actuarial and other insurance operations across financial reporting, data cleansing, data transformation, data analysis, and business modeling • Supporting the documentation of business requirements with respect to models, data, or process• Supporting model testing through reconciliation, unit testing, regression testing• Operating processes to produce data and results needed for analysis and reporting• Analyze and perform research and analysis to explain movement in financial results• Collaborating with A&IS Core team members to understand priorities and execute• Developing tools and materials that can be leveraged for future projects• Participating in practice development activities to enhance the capabilities and promote the culture of the USDCThe teamOur US Delivery Center team is comprised of deeply passionate and experienced professionals who guide clients through their most complex business capability and technology challenges. We work with clients and help them develop software solutions, manage their applications, and provide strategic recommendations to help them optimize their businesses' operations, processes, and performance. Learn more about the US Delivery Center.QualificationsTechnical Skills• Experience with organizing data, querying, and analyzing data through database/data management tools such as SQL, Access, Tableau, Excel/VBA • Experience performing statistical analysis using tools such as SAS, MATLAB, R, Python• Proficiency using computer software such as Excel, Access, Word, and PowerPoint; plus, a high level of general computer literacy and comfort with new tools and applications• Proven history of task execution, with timeliness and high quality• Superior research, analytical, and problem-solving skills• Ability to clearly document processes, work performed, support for decisions made• Analytical problem-solving skills including experience reconciling, trending, or analyzing system or spreadsheet output and explaining differences in resultsNon-Technical Skills • Task and detail oriented; working well independently without continual oversight• Strong written and verbal communication skills, effective listening skills• Ability to execute on multiple engagements simultaneously• Team player who enjoys working with multiple teams• Enthusiasm for serving clients and an eye toward continuous improvement• Travel up to 20% annually (While 20% of travel is a requirement of the role, due to COVID-19, non-essential travel has been suspended until further notice.)• Must live near, or relocate to, Gilbert, AZ, Mechanicsburg, PA or Lake Mary, FL.• Limited immigration sponsorship may be availablePreferred:• Experience in an insurance company environment• Experience with financial modeling and forecasting • Experience in data visualization and dashboard creation using Tableau• Experience in a consulting environment• Experience with life insurance and annuity products• Experience with actuarial systems
